messages.content: Convert the following character traits into a natural English sentence that describes the appearance and personality of a cartoon character. Each input contains: eye color, hair color, hair style, gender, personality traits, and age.

eye color : 갈색
hair color : 금발
hair style : 곱슬 단발
성별 : FEMALE
성격 : 활발하고 장난기 많으며 상상력이 풍부함
age : 12
a 12-year-old girl with lively brown eyes, curly short blonde hair, and a playful, imaginative personality
